ygData.subject: Re: Re: What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: Cured silk makes you look like a monk?  I would have to disagree, what makes us look like monks are the fact that we look like newbies.  I personally much
ygData.messageBody:
Cured silk makes you look like a monk? I would have to disagree, what
makes us look like monks are the fact that we look like newbies. I
personally much prefer foreman's tunic. Here is a comparison

Cured Silk Gi
8ac
0.1wt

Foreman's Tunic
10ac
+3str +3dex
WEIGHTLESS

you have .1 less weight, 2 more ac, and +3 str. Ok, so it looks leather
but who cares. Once you get to 30 you won't wear anything that looks
like cured silk. Thats because there is better stuff out there

--

Hammeron
Monk of Quellious
Karana

--
Worlord
worlord@...
